select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%' or bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
order by bgroup desc, bstep asc)a) where rnum >=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select * from board where bno = (select prevDto from (select bno,id,lag(bno,1,-1)over(order by bgroup desc, bstep asc)as prevDto from board
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%' or bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) where bno = #{bno})

select * from board where bno = (select nextDto from (select bno,id,lead(bno,1,-1)over(order by bgroup desc, bstep asc)as nextDto from board
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
where btitle like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%' or bcontent like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) where bno = #{bno})
